alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 2:29PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Mississippi and southwestern Lauderdale Counties through 300 PM CST... At 229 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Marie, or near Keiser, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Osceola, Wilson, Keiser, Fort Pillow State Park, Marie, Fulton, Ashport, Ft Pillow, Delpro, Evadale, Driver, Grider, Rosa, Carson Lake, Golddust, Three Point, Rotan, Keyes Port, Sans Souci and Hilton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
